summary: Onions are a type of vegetable from the Allium family, which includes garlic and leeks. They are one of the most widely grown species of this genus. Onions have hollow, green leaves and a round bulb at the base. This bulb swells when the plant gets enough sunlight. Onions are usually grown as annual plants, harvested in their first year. They can be eaten raw or cooked and are used in many dishes worldwide. Some varieties, like shallots, grow multiple bulbs. Onions have a strong smell and can make your eyes water when you cut them.
title: Onion
